posts.title: “尚筹网”项目笔记
posts.text: 1. 1 项目架构1.1.1 创建工程 创建空项目atcrowdfunding 在 atcrowdfunding项目中创建三个moudle（不选择模板）： atcrowdfunding01-admin-parent atcrowdfunding05-common-util atcrowdfunding06-common-reverse 另外创建三个moudle（不选模板，parent选择atcrowdfunding01-admin-parent）： atcrowdfunding02-admin-webui（添加web） atcrowdfunding03-admin-component atcrowdfunding04-admin-entity 在各自的pom.xml文件中选择打包方式： ​ atcrowdfunding01-admin-parent选择pom，atcrowdfunding02-admin-webui选war，其他选jar 1<packaging>war</packaging> 1.1.2 添加moudle间的依赖关系 依赖关系： webui 依赖 component component 依赖 entity和util 添加依赖： atcrowdfunding02-admin-webui下的pom.xml文件： 1234567<dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>com.atguigu.crowd</groupId> <artifactId>atcrowdfunding03-admin-component</artifactId> <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version> </dependency></dependencies> atcrowdfunding03-admin-component下的pom.xml文件 123456789101112<dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>com.atguigu.crowd</groupId> <artifactId>atcrowdfunding04-admin-entity</artifactId> <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>com.atguigu.crowd</groupId> <artifactId>atcrowdfunding05-common-util</artifactId> <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version> </dependency></dependencies> 1.2 创建数据库相关内容1.2.1 创建数据库1create database project_crowd character set utf8; 1.2.2 创建表123456789create table t_admin( id int not null auto_increment , # 主键 account varchar(255) not null, # 登陆账号 password char(32) not null, # 密码 username varchar(255) not null, # 用户名 email varchar(255) not null, # 邮箱 creat_time char(19), # 创建时间 primary key(id)); 1.3

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
